definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

pinyin: pai2 wu1 di4 xia4 zhu3 guan3 wang3

sentences.english: The utility model can effectively avoid foreign odor and harmful gas emitted by the contamination of the drain.
sentences.chinese: 能有效避免排污管被污染而散发异味和有害气体。

sentences.english: The ground was covered with dirt with great wide ditches.
sentences.chinese: 地面上满是尘土，而且有很宽的排污沟。

sentences.english: Machine please drain valve is opened more than two times a week.
sentences.chinese: 机台请每周打开排污阀两次以上。

sentences.english: Guangzhou is expected to take the lead in collecting light pollution fees in the country.
sentences.chinese: 广州市将率先在全国开征光污染排污费。

sentences.english: No significant correlation was observed between diatom red tide and alongshore pollutants discharge.
sentences.chinese: 而近岸排污与硅藻赤潮发生的相关性不明显。

sentences.english: Under Nanjing Yangtze River sewage pipes' anti-corrosion engineering.
sentences.chinese: 南京长江底下排污管道的防腐工程。

sentences.english: Water will be drawn from underground wells and there are suitable outlets for effluent discharge.
sentences.chinese: 用水将从地下水井中抽取，并且有合适的排污口。

sentences.english: The right trade theory was put forward by famous economist Dales.
sentences.chinese: 排污权交易理论是由著名经济学家戴尔斯提出的。

sentences.english: The series non-clogging sewage pump, sewage capacity exceptionally strong.
sentences.chinese: 该系列中无堵塞排污泥浆泵，排污能力特强。

sentences.english: The series non-clogging sewage pump, sewage capacity exceptionally strong.
sentences.chinese: 该系列中无堵塞排污泥浆泵，排污能力特强。

sentences.english: Almost all major industries have put wastes into our water.
sentences.chinese: 几乎各大产业都向我们的水域排污。

sentences.english: Large discharging outlet frecovery tank, easy to clean.
sentences.chinese: 超大排污口，设计合理，水箱清洗方便。

sentences.english: A basis for selection of pollution discharge positions is provided.
sentences.chinese: 据此可为桑沟湾沿岸的排污口选址提供依据。

sentences.english: We will continue to experiment with the cap-and-trade emissions trading system.
sentences.chinese: 继续开展排污权有偿使用和交易试点。

sentences.english: Money was raised through selling sewer bonds.
sentences.chinese: 资金通过出售排污债券筹得。

sentences.english: And the unloadings from the factories cause great detriment of superposed F pollution.
sentences.chinese: 工厂排污导致的叠加氟污染危害较大，应引起重视。
